EmailTemplate.subject: You’re Invited -Transformation Council May 1-2
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Pivotal is pleased to host our third Transformation Council Workshop led by Eric Ries, author of The Lean Startup, The Leader’s Guide and soon to be published, The Startup Way. We invite you to join us on May 1-2 in San Francisco for this exclusive event.
Pivotal’s Transformation Council is an invite-only community for enterprise executives who are driving digital transformation within their organization. The purpose of the council is to create a trusted forum where executives can regularly come together to learn, exchange ideas, and share their organizational experiences with one another.
The two-day event will kick off with a private dinner at One Market <[[http://onemarket.com/]]>, followed by a half-day of discussions and workshop. The workshop theme is “Failure is not an option, it’s necessary to transform."
Agenda
Monday, May 1–Private Dinner
Location: One Market <[[http://onemarket.com/]]> 1 Market Street San Francisco, Ca 94105
6:30–10:00 pm Networking and socializing for Transformation Council members
Tuesday, May 2 –Transformation Talk & Workshop Location: Terra Gallery <[[http://terrasf.com]]> 511 Harrison St San Francisco, Ca 94105
8:00–8:30 am Breakfast
8:30–8:45 am Welcome remarks by Bill Cook and Edward Hieatt
8:45–9:30 am Opening comments by Eric Ries on “Failure is not an option, it’s necessary to transform your organization.”
9:30–9:45 am Break
9:45–11:15 am Workshop on integrating fail and learn concepts into your organization
11:15–11:45 am Standups (Let’s share what we’ve learned)
11:45–12:00 noon Closing remarks - Eric Ries
12:00 noon Lunch (Boxed lunch provided for those traveling)
Space is limited so please RSVP <[[https://pivotal.io/event/transformation-council/san-francisco?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=transformation-council-2017]]> to secure your spot. We look forward to you joining us to start your transformation journey.
The Pivotal Transformation Team
